body:
Comment 6: 
If you'd like to send a CL for cmd/dist that adds -Wno-dangling-else to the argument
list when CC[0] ends in "clang", that'd be great.  I don't think it has to hold up Go 1
if not.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
